instructions.title: How to Play
instructions.step0: 1. Order biblical events chronologically by placing each card in its correct position on the timeline.
instructions.step1: 2. You will be shown a card with a biblical event
instructions.step2: 3. Drag and drop the card to the correct position on the timeline
instructions.step3: 4. If you place it correctly, you'll earn a point and continue
instructions.step4: 5. If you make a mistake, the game will end
instructions.step5: 6. Carefully read the date and event on each card
instructions.step6: 7. Remember that BCE (Before Common Era) goes in descending order
instructions.step7: 8. CE (Common Era) dates go in ascending order
